name: Hollow knight: Champions of hallownest multiplayer
name_original: Hollow knight: Champions of hallownest multiplayer
description:
Be sure to subscribe to my channel ;)
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHVKdlsk-AcliOJ18-hrbyw

A Hollow knight PvP game that you can play with friends! Use each others skills and dominate on the battlefield!

How to connect with other players!

1.First get the id that is randomly generated in your main menu

2. Then pass the id to a friend and tell them to enter it on the
text box below! then hit connect!

Bugs and issues:

-this game is still in development and some stuff isnt finished
-might lag a lot cause the game runs on browser

Disclaimer:

I am in no way associated with Team Cherry, I am just a fan and a Game Developer.

Hollow Knight is a property by Team Cherry. This is a free fan project and a love letter to the eternal masterpiece. Please support Team Cherry and their official titles.
